assignments.name: Assign_value_in_case_record_variable
assignments.label: Assign value in case record variable

value.stringValue: Termination Request - Details can be found in Service Request Details section

formulas.name: varServiceRequest
formulas.expression: IF({!Personal_Cell_Phone_Number}!=NULL, "Personal Cell Phone Number - " +{!Personal_Cell_Phone_Number}+{!newLine} , "") + IF({!Personal_Email_Address1}!=NULL, "Personal Email Address - " +{!Personal_Email_Address1}+{!newLine} , "") +If(NOT(ISNULL({!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName})), "Move Existing Direct Reports to - " + {!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName} + {!newLine},null)+{!newLine}+ "Requested Delegation"+{!newLine} +If({!Email_forwarding2}==TRUE,"Email forwarding - 90 days default" +{!newLine},null)+ If({!Phone_number_forwarding2}==TRUE,"Phone number forwarding - 90 days default " +{!newLine},null)+ If({!Phone_number_forwarding2}==TRUE,"Forward Phone number for 90 Days to "+{!VarUpdateExstiongPhone}+ {!newLine},null)+ If({!Mailbox_delegation2}==TRUE,"Mailbox delegation - 90 days default " +{!newLine},null)+ If({!One_Drive_Access2}==TRUE,"One Drive Access - 90 days default " +{!newLine},null)+ If({!eDiscovery_hold}==TRUE,"eDiscovery hold - 90 days default" +{!newLine},null)+ IF({!Requested_Delegation_to1.recordName}!=NULL, "Requested Delegation to - " +{!Requested_Delegation_to1.recordName}+ {!newLine}, "") +{!newLine}+ If(!ISNULL({!Additional_Information}) && !ISBLANK({!Additional_Information}), 'Additional Information - ' + {!Additional_Information} + {!newLine}, Null)

formulas.name: varServicerequest2
formulas.expression: If({!Requested_By2}!=null,{!Requested_By2}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ IF({!Cousaltant.recordName}!=NULL, "Requested For - " +{!Cousaltant.recordName}+{!newLine} , "") +{!newLine}+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Region2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Region2}))), "Region - " +{!Region2} + {!newLine} ,null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Brand2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Brand2}))), "Brand - " +{!Brand2} + {!newLine} ,null)+ IF({!Brand3}!=NULL, "Brand - " +{!Brand3}+ {!newLine}, "")+ If({!Requested_for1}!=null,{!Requested_for1}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If({!Show_Manager}!=null, {!Show_Manager}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If({!Show_Job_Description}!=null, {!Show_Job_Description}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If({!Show_Department}!=null,{!Show_Department}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If ((NOT(ISNULL(TEXT({!Termination_Effective_Date_Time}))) && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!Termination_Effective_Date_Time})))),"Termination Effective Date Time - " +TEXT({!Termination_Effective_Date_Time})+{!newLine} ,null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Time_Zone2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Time_Zone2}))), "Time Zone - " +{!Time_Zone2} + {!newLine} ,null)+{!newLine}+ "Address of Employee"+{!newLine}+ If(!ISNULL({!Address_1}) && !ISBLANK({!Address_1}), 'Address 1 - ' + {!Address_1} + {!newLine}, Null) +IF({!Address_2}!=NULL, " Address 2 (Apt or Unit#) - " +{!Address_2}+ {!newLine}, "") +If(!ISNULL({!City1}) && !ISBLANK({!City1}), 'City - ' + {!City1} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!State_Province}) && !ISBLANK({!State_Province}), 'State/Province - ' + {!State_Province} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Zip_Postal_Code}) && !ISBLANK({!Zip_Postal_Code}), 'Zip/Postal Code - ' + {!Zip_Postal_Code} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Country}) && !ISBLANK({!Country}), 'Country - ' + {!Country} + {!newLine}, Null)+{!newLine}

fields.name: Requested_for1
fields.fieldText: User being Terminated - {!Get_Contact_from_Selection.Name}ï»¿

fields.name: Display1
fields.fieldText: Address of Employee

validationRule.errorMessage: Contact Phone number must be Numeric. Should be between 7 -15 digit long.

fields.name: Requested_By2
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿Requested By

{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
